org.fujion.plotly.plot

Class TrendOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.plot.TrendOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class TrendOptions
extends Options
    Controls how upward or downward trend information is displayed.

    • Field Summary

      The fill color.

      Integer line_width
      The width (in px) of line bounding the box(es).
      String name
      The segment name.

      Determines whether or not an item corresponding to this segment is shown in the legend.

    • Field Detail

      • fillcolor

        @Option
public String fillcolor
        The fill color.

        Default: A half-transparent variant of the line color, marker color, or marker line color, whichever is available.

      • line_color

        @Option(value="line.color")
public String line_color
        The color of line bounding the box(es).

        Default: "#3D9970"

      • line_dash$enum

        @Option(value="line.dash")
public DashStyleEnum line_dash$enum
        The dash style of lines.

        Default: SOLID

      • line_dash$string

        @Option(value="line.dash")
public String line_dash$string
        An alternative in the form of a dash length list in px (eg "5px,10px,2px,2px").

      • line_width

        @Option(value="line.width")
public Integer line_width
        The width (in px) of line bounding the box(es).

        Default: 2

      • name

        @Option
public String name
        The segment name. The segment name appear as the legend item and on hover.

      • showlegend

        @Option
public Boolean showlegend
        Determines whether or not an item corresponding to this segment is shown in the legend.

        Default: true

      • TrendOptions

        public TrendOptions()
